My name is Aidan Clyens. Ever since I was a little kid, I always had an interest in building things. In high school, I was introduced to electronics and got to build a Bluetooth controlled RC car using an Arduino.
This lead me to major in Computer Engineering at the University of Waterloo from 2016 - 2021, where I earned my Bachelor of Applied Science.
I have a wide range of interests in software and computer engineering, but currently my main focus is in embedded systems programming. My go-to languages are C++ and Python.
